name: citrusui.me
description: The clean and simple website of Avery Magnotti.

scripts.firebase: npm run clean && npm run prod && npx firebase deploy
scripts.ipfs: (ipfs daemon &) && while ! nc -z localhost 5001; do sleep 1; done && export IPFS_HASH=`ipfs add -q -r _site | tail -n1` && ipfs add -r _site && ipfs name publish $IPFS_HASH && killall ipfs
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run prod && npm run ipfs && firebase deploy

author: Avery Magnotti <averymagnotti@outlook.com>
